HOUSING COMMITTEE
COMMITTEE MEETING
~ AGENDA ~
Tuesday, March 3, 2020

6:00 PM

Sullivan Chamber

The Housing Committee will meet for a hearing to receive an update from the Cambridge Housing
Authority, Community Development, Affordable Trust Fund, Just a Start and Homeowners Rehab,
Inc. on the state of Affordable Housing in Cambridge and challenges and opportunities facing the
City over the next two years

City of Cambridge

Page 1
